name: trrelssd
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0

stmt.origin: sstrd(ccom(c0, c1), c2, ccom(c2, c2), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c2, c2), c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c2, c2), c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), ccom(c2, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wss(ccom(c0, c1), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(ccom(c2, c2), c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c0, c2))
-| wi(w0, wss(c1, c2))

comment: The composition of subclasses of a transitive relation is a subclass of that relation. (Contributed by RP, 24-Dec-2019.)
